name: Verify Overall Analytics page loads correctly
description: Test that the Overall Analytics page loads with all required components and data
preconditions: User is logged in with appropriate permissions

test_case_steps.step: Verify all product cards are visible
test_case_steps.result: All expected product cards (Architect, Eureka, Email, etc.) are displayed
Loading indicators appear and then disappear when data loads

name: Validate date range picker functionality
description: Ensure date range picker allows selection and applies filters correctly

test_case_steps.step: Select a custom date range (last 7 days)
test_case_steps.result: Date range is updated and displayed
Analytics data refreshes for the selected date range
URL includes startDate and endDate query parameters

name: Test export functionality
description: Verify that analytics data can be exported to Excel format

test_case_steps.step: Navigate to Overall Analytics page with data

test_case_steps.result: Excel file contains correct analytics data
